GSD.description:
select: Fix indefinitely sleeping task in poll_schedule_timeout()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.227 by commit 6717900f775a6129a7b4d03ba4922218d8bf1caa. For more details please see the references link.
